title: All-Party Parliamentary Group for Rural Business and the Rural Powerhouse
purpose: To champion the interests of rural businesses and communities, promote sustainable economic growth, and ensure rural voices are heard at the heart of policymaking through cross-party collaboration and evidence-based advocacy.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 4498.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Henry Welch, Country Land and Business Association (CLA). Tel: 07792 097145
contact_details.secretariat: Country Land and Business Association (CLA) acts as the group's secretariat.https://www.cla.org.uk/
